p: Efforts to alleviate the impact of climate change have led to increased research into traits such as drought and heat tolerance, as well as biotic stresses (Abberton et al., 2015; Doebley, Gaut, & Smith, 2006; Gepts, 2010). Soil and water salinity, which have been exacerbated due to the climate change driven factors such as sea level rise and shifts in precipitation (Teh & Koh, 2016), are also one of the major restrictions in the production of crops including legumes (Russell, 1976; Shrivastava & Kumar, 2015).
